inn1.comm: Nice outswinger to start off things. Swing from the middle and leg stump line, Uthappa waits for it to curve in, pushes it back down the track
Again some banana swing there. Slow though. Again starts off from leg and middle, curves in towards middle and off, worked to mid-wicket

Another one that swings away, starts off from leg and middle, moves towards middle and Uthappa this time decides to place it through the gap between midwicket and mid-on. Wise decision not to try whipping it square. It is swinging, albeit slow.
back-of-length delivery to Ganguly, on the off and middle, Ganguly gets behind the line and defends
121.9kmph, around the off stump, Ganguly leans forward, opens the bat-face, guides it to point
Good delivery. Fuller and swings into the blockhole, Ganguly arrests his front foot movement and jabs it away to the on side. Interesting first over. Bit of swing and two cautious batsmen.

OMG! what a catch by Dwayne Leverock! And what wild celebrations! Let no body say anymore that a fat man can't jump!  Uthappa has a nervous poke, away from the body, at  a length-delivery outside off stump. It flew to the right of  Leverock who hurled himself - hard to visualise, I am not lying but that's what happened- to his right and plucked it single-handed. And the celebrations followed. He ran off to nowhere in particular, changed directions and again went on a jig. The players mobbed him, few other went down in  heap in midwicket in celebration. All over each other. Bermuda are overjoyed. The bowler is the bottom of that heap and hold on .. he is crying. Tears of joy! Meanwhile Leverock is busy giving flying kisses to the crowd! What a start!
well outside off, left alone
Swing and a miss! again well outside the off stump, Sehwag frees his arms, but can't reach to it
length-delivery on the off stump line, defended off the front foot
beaten! Nervous times continue for Sehwag. Another wide slash outside off stump. Sehwag is living  dangerously.
In the channel outside off stump, Sehwag resists the urge and lets it go through
Crash! Short of length, outside off stump and Sehwag leans forward and hits it on the up through cover point
banged in short, at the body, Ganguly laps it around the corner
Full and straight, on the off and middle stump line, defended on the front foot
leans forward to a length-delivery and defends
goes hard at a delivery, just outside off and punches it to short cover.
short of length, a touch wide outside off stump, Sehwag pushes his bat out, away from the body, guides it to point
homes in on the off stump - nice probing line, punched to the off side

Sehwag breaks through the off side cordon. A fullish delivery, outside off and Sehwag hit at the length and the width. Creamed it through extra cover, misfielded there and he will get four valuable runs.
Length-delivery, slanting away from Ganguly who guides it to point
slips down the leg side, at waist-high and Ganguly tries to tickle it away but makes no contact.
full in length, on the off and middle stump line, shapes away a touch, Ganguly shuffles across, pushes it out to cover
pushes a length-delivery back to the bowler

Edged! But no second slip and Ganguly survives! Leverock is the man at first slip watching in anguish as the ball goes through to the gap. It was a full in length, and outside off and sucked a slightly hesitant Ganguly into a nervous prod.
Slightly short in length, around off stump, Ganguly pivots to pull but the timing is awry and the ball rolls to the right of midwicket
in the corridor, Sehwag moves towards the line, punches it to cover.
on the off and middle stump line, Ganguly gets behind the line, pushes it out to mid-off. Then walks towards square-leg.
nippy delivery. Cut back in  touch after landing on a length, aroud middle stump line. Cut Ganguly in half and rapped him on the thigh pad.

another lovely delivery. Ganguly is certainly bit edgy today. Understandable. The name is pressure. Another full-length delivery, lands on the middle and off and shapes in. Ganguly is rooted to the crease, pushes at it and gets an inside-edge on to his pad
bit of width outside off stump, short in length as well, Ganguly played it late and pierced the backward point region
low full-toss, hint of in-swing, around off stump, Ganguly doesn't do much with it. Leans forward, pushes it out to cover.

shout for lbw. Again that delivery bent back in to trouble Ganguly. Ganguly leant forward, pushes at a length-delivery, and is struck just outside off stump. And thus he survives. Lovely probing delivery.
another one that curves in a touch, and Ganguly tries to drive but the bat-face shuts as the ball bends in and it rolls back to the bowler
Sehwag leans forward, square-drives a length-delivery through point. Nice looking shot
back of length, just outside off stump, bowled with a scrambled seam, driven to point
lands outside off stump, comes back in a touch, driven to the off side
Whack! That would give him immense confidence. Short and well outside off stump and Sehwag rocked back to cut it past point.
back of length, around off stump, Sehwag stands tall, punches it to point.
Slap! Sehwag rings the room service and is served one short and wide outside off stump and he spanks it past point. Not good bowling but Sehwag won't be complaining.
Meanwhile Ganguly continues to be troubled by the inswing. Lands on the off stump, the bat comes down in an angle and gets a inside-edge on to the pads and it runs towards point
full in length, just outside off stump, pushed to cover
beaten! Bit of width outside off stump, Sehwag goes hard at it, has a flash but wood meets air.
jaffa! Super delivery that. Landed on a length, on the off stump line and shaped away late. Very late. Sehwag's bat came inside the line and was beaten.
tempts him with a delivery well outside off stump, Sehwag resists the temptation.
nice shape to that delivery. Lands on a length, around off and moves away. Sehwag is cautious this time, watches the movement, and shoulders arms.
probing delivery. The interrogation continues. Fuller and just outside off with a  hint of away movement. Sehwag leans forward, moves towards the line, opens the bat-face and guides it to point.
Ganguly is frustrated. Tries to break free with a charge down the leg side. Attempts a heave across the line, misses and the ball goes over the middle stump.

fullish, on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler who has a fling at the stumps. Ganguly moves away from the trajectory, the ball crashes into the furtniture with a bemused Ganguly still inside the crease.
a delivery angling away from the off stump, dabbed to third man
landed on a length, on the middle and leg line, defended to the on side
Bosh! Sehwag is creaming them today. Another overpitched delivery has been sent screaming through the cover region.
on the hips, clipped past square-leg for a single.
In the temptation zone: just outside off stump. Sehwag leans forward and shoulders arms.
this one goes straight on after landing on the off stump line, Sehwag leans forward, then eases back to defend. Head over the ball and the left elbow high. He is focussing today.
Smack! Short and a tad wide outside off stump, Sehwag eases his weight to his back foot and square-cuts it past point.
Leans forward to a delivery in the channel and lets it go through to the 'keeper
closer to the off stump, not much of a away-curve and so Sehwag leans towards it, opens the bat-face and runs it down to third man
wide outside off stump, Sehwag is tempted a touch, plonks his left foot across, raises the bat but sees the ball is too wide and just watches it sail past him.
Doesn't hold back this time. Almost took out the short-cover fielder. Fierce drive. Again full and well outside off stump, Sehawag launches into it with a drill through cover.
shifts his line from outside off stump but ends up drifting to the hip. The fine-leg is up inside the circle and Sehwag just laps it around the corner, past that man.

Three in a row! Short and outside off, cut past point. First one was driven through cover, so he changed his length and line but got tickled around the corner. This one was again outside off and he got punished.
length-delivery on the off stump line, defended to the off side
similar delivery, Sehwag leans forward, taps it close on the off side, sets off for a run but Ganguly doesn't respond and he has to go back
There he goes again! Another one wide and outside off and Sehwag pounces at it. Crash! and it screams past cover point.
on the middle peg, pushed back to the bowler. Ganguly is on 11 in 22 balls. Cautious and hesitant.
full in length, around off and middle stump line, punched to cover.
Ganguly tries to break free of the shackles. Fails. He walks across to the off side and whips a fullish delivery but straight to square-leg. What would he do next? Will he give him the charge?

he doesn't quite charge but backs away a touch to the leg side and whacks a fullish delivery straight back at the bowler. Half-stop there and no chance of a run. Ganguly is still tied up on 11. The pressure is building.
way down the leg side
almost inside-edged on to the stumps. No-ball though. Just outside off stump, keeps a touch low, and Ganguly pokes at it, the bat comes down in an angle and the inside-edge takes it to short fine leg
fullish, well outside off stump and Sehwag reaches out to drive inside-out. Gets a outside-edge, along the ground and down to third man
on the off stump line, strangling Ganguly by offering him no room, pushed to cover.
leans forward, drives a length-delivery to cover
short of length, outside off stump, punched to sweeper cover
leans forward, places a fullish delivery to extra cover
Up and just over mid-off! Back of length, just outside off stump and Sehwag swats it , flat-bats it over mid-off. A agonising jump at mid-off but it goes well over him.

50 up with a push to mid-on. Sehwag pumps his fist in the air, raises his bat towards the pavilion where his team-mates are up on their feet clapping. Ganguly quickly gets across to congratulate. Suddenly, the world would look beautiful to Sehwag.
fullish, on the middle stump line, turned to square-leg

dropped! By Borren running back from mid-off. Ganguly gave the charge, attemped a lofted-drive over the off side ring but ends up skying it up. Borren ran back and to his right, got into a nice position actually but ended up palming it. Attempts to take on rebound but rebounds ,be it in cricket or relationships, doesn't work out well.
short of lenght, outside off stump, pushed to point
fuller and around off stump, driven to mid-off
Full in length, outside off stump, run down to third man for a single
beaten! Pushed that one across Ganguly who has a flash at it but can't reach it.
Wow! Sehwag goes down town. Overpitched on the off stump line, down came the bat in a flurry. Blink. The ball was picked from the long off boundary. Hit along the ground.
slightly wide and cut to deep point
full in length, again on that nagging off and middle stump line and Ganguly pushes it out to point
tries to back away but Tucker hurls that one wider, outside off, Ganguly reaches out, cuts it to backward point. Well bowled.
on the middle peg, full in length, Ganguly pushes it tamely back to the bowler.
on the middle and leg stump line, worked to square-leg.
Just around the off stump line, nudged to point. David Hemp is the new man. Didn't bowl in the first game.
slipping down the leg side, tickled around the corner.
full, straight, Ganguly just pushes it back to the bowler. His chokehold continues.
punches this one through the line to wide mid-off
Boom! Boom! Sehwag loves the down town area. Leans forward and drives a fullish delivery, back over the bowler's head. Up and up and over!

well outside the off stump, Sehwag reaches out for it, can't put bat to ball and the 'keeper whips the bails off. It is a no ball but for some reason it is refered upstairs. Anyways, not out comes the verdict.
Whack! Sehwag is on fire! Raging bull! Drills a overpitched-delivery, inside-out, over cover. What a shot! What a player!
on the off stump line, pushed to cover
full in length, on the middle and leg stump line, worked past midwicket for a single
on a length, just outside off stump, punched to mid-off
full and on the legs , clipped past square-leg for a single.
full and straight, driven back  to the bowler. A rare dot ball from Sehwag
Slower one, but ends up a full-toss outside leg stump. That was really slow. Sehwag had to wait for an eternity before shovelling it away to long-leg. Four more and the 100 of the partnership is up.
floats on the middle and leg stump line, dabbed past square-leg
arm-ball - lovely delivery, on the off and middle stump line, Sehwag pushes at it tentatively and gets a inside-edge
backs away to the leg side, another arm-ball follows him, punched out to extra cover for a quick single
Lands outside off stump, guided straight to short third man
continues to struggle a touch. Leans forward, tries to work it to on side but instead, gets a outside edge to the off side.
Ganguly is not panicking though. No wild swings for him. Places this one to cover point. He is biding his time.
fullish, on the middle and leg, Ganguly leans forward, plays it to midwicket
slower one, Ganguly is almost too early into his drives, adjusts by taking out bottom hand out of the handle, pushes it to cover
another dot ball. Guided to short third man.
Strokelessness continues. Dabbed straight to square-leg
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket. Will it be a maiden?
It is. On the middle stump line, moves away a touch, Ganguly tries to work it to on side, gets a leading edge to cover. I wonder how long will he wait before he tries to hit his way out of the rut.
tossed up, on the off stump line, driven inside-out to deep cover
There he goes! Ganguly breaks free! Down he comes and sends it soaring over long-off! Super strike!
on the middle and off stump line, pushed back to the bowler. Nice loop there
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler.
leans forward, whips a fullish delvery past midwicket
almost bowled! Super quick arm-ball, Sehwag had backed away a touch and got his bat in line in a hurry to keep it out. Very well bowled and well adjusted at the end.
leans forward, punches a length-delivery to deep cover
full in length, gentle seam-up stuff on the off stump, driven to long off
Driven to long-on. Slowly he seems to be coming into his groove. That six hit and after that he has been middling.
Sehwag drives to long off. The strike is rotated.
on the middle and leg, Ganguly leans forward, turns it to midwicket
slower one, outside off stump, Ganguly takes out the top-hand off the handle, drives to long-off
Ganguly gives the charge again, drives inside-out to wide mid-off.
full in length, driven down to long-on
drifts on to the middle stump line, Sehwag opened the bat-face, pushed it to cover point for a single.
turns in from outside off, played with the spin towards square-leg
Fullish, outside off and Sehwag, donning a cap, drove it inside-out to sweeper cover
tossed up, on the middle and leg stump line, worked to right of midwicket, down to the man at deep.
on the middle and off stump line, nudged to cover point. Ganguly stays rooted, Sehwag is almost down to the middle of the track and gets back.
tossed up, full in length, driven to long-off
leans forward, whips a delivery from outside off to the right of midwicket. Ala that touch artiste Azhar.
lands on the leg stump line, moves towards off and middle, dabbed to the on side
gently drops into the blochole. Ganguly removes his right leg from the line, jabs it back to the bowler
will get a single this time with a drive to long-off
Wallop! Ganguly goes berserk. Another charge down the track, another swing and it flies over deep midwicket. Ganguly is very good against left-arm spinners. Ask Nicky Boje.
rotates the strike with a push to cover
another arm-ball, comes in towards the off stump, cut to point
driven back to the bowler.
close to the off stump but slightly short in length and Sehwag flays it through backward point.
tossed up, just outside off and Sehwag drives inside-out to the sweeper cover.
Crack! Sehwag down the track and blitzes it way over midwicket for a four. He met the ball as a half-volley and gave it one mighty wallop
Dabbed to the leg side, the batsman decide against the single
Pushes to the leg side and scampers a quick single this time
Defensive prod, can only pad it to the off side
Short ball and Ganguly rocks back to steer it through the covers for a brace
Drifting down leg and tucked away for a single. Our statsguru HR Gopalakrishna alerts me that Ganguly and Ricky Ponting are currently sharing the record for the most sixes in the World Cup (25 each)
Yorker length ball, dug out by Ganguly down the ground
Slightly wide of the stumps and tapped to the off side, Not run again
Slightly straighter and slower, back of a length, Ganguly pushes it straight to short midwicket
flicked behind square for a single. And that's his second consecutive fifty in this tournament. What a run he's having
Driven down the ground for a single
on the middle and leg, flicked to square-leg
One flew over the cuckoo's nest. And would you believe it, he was on 90. Fullish and on the middle and leg stump line and Sehwag swings it over deep square-leg. He moves to 96.
lands outside off, a touch short, keeps low and Sehwag tries to heave it to the on side but is beaten by the lack of bounce.
beaten! Millions of Indian fans will having a heartattack. In the zone outside off, he leans forward, drives but only meets thin air
dabs to third man for a single.
on the leg stump line, worked to backward square-leg for a single
worked to the leg side for a single
Moves to 99 with a flat-batted heave over cover. The fielder jumped up, stretched his hand out but can't reach it. He moves to 99.
lands on a length, on the middle stump line, bends back in, raps him on the thigh pad and runs down to third man
Thwack! Ganguly goes up and over mid-off. A hop down the track, backing away in the process and drives inside-out over that man at mid-off.
Slips down the leg side, almost brushing the leg stump, Wide called though. Ganguly had tried to flick it but failed.
full and on the middle and leg, Ganguly leans forward, whips it , in the air, to the right of diving midwicket fielder. Leverock runs across from wide mid-on to make the stop.
again Ganguly takes a single off the last ball. Drives a full-pitched delivery to right of cover.
full and on the middle and off stump line, Ganguly tries to swing it across the line, gets a inside-edge on to the pads and it rolls over to the off side
full-pitched, Ganguly gets Sehwag on strike with a drive to mid-off.
he has to wait. Slower one on the off stump line, dabbed to point, takes a few steps down the track and retreats.
Full and wide, Sehwag's eyes lit up and he has a flash. Bat meets thin air as the ball rushes to the 'keeper. Drama!
And again! Sehwag is unable to make contact with his attempted cut shot. Ganguly walks over, has a chat, smiles on both faces. Sehwag takes a deep breath and takes guard again.

That's it! Sehwag reaches his hundred! It has been two years since he last scored one. It has taken some time to come but he has got there again. Fullish, just outside off and he runs it down to third man. The Indians in the crowd go wild.

Butchered away! Overpitched, outside off stump and Sehwag celebrates  his ton with a thrash past mid-on. Now he signals to the dressing room, wants a change of the bat. It will have to wait till the end of the over.
short of length, on the off stump line, swatted away to mid-on
Ganguly charges out, reaches the pitch of the delivery and chips it over mid-on. Bottom-handed powered that stroke.
on the middle and leg stump line, dabbed to short fine leg
length-delivery, coming in towards middle stump line, Sehwag tries to hit through the line, pushes it out towards mid-on
Ganguly walks across to the off side, bowler pushes it down the leg side. Wide called.
And again. Jones slips this one as well , down the leg side. Ganguly can't reach it.
around off stump, slow through the air, dabbed away to off side.
from round the wickets comes another wide down the leg side. Ganguly is repeatedly trying to move towards off and that is upsetting the young bowler's rhythm

Flies past the outstretched hand at mid-off. Full-pitched delivery, outside off and Sehwag flays it , in the air, past the diving mid-off. It needed a superman or Leverock to take it!  correction It was Leverock who dived, then not even Superman can take it.
Whoosh! This is the final over of Powerplay and Ganguly is taking full toll. Charges out and swings a length-delivery over midwicket.
Wants a single, but pushes it straight back to the bowler.
he will get his single this time. Wants Sehwag on strike for the remaining part of the Powerplay. Pushes it to the off side and rushes across for a quick single
Murder! Stand and deliver! Knifes through the line of a full-length delviery and it flies over mid-on

Sehwag falls! But what a fiesty innings under pressure this has been. With two balls left to go before the Powerplay ends, he tried to go for the broke. He shaped to swing a full-pitched delivery over mid-on, gets a leading edge and balloons it towards mid-off where the fielder back-pedalled to take the catch.
drifts on to the legs , whipped past square-leg
on the off stump line, dabbed away towards gully
full-pitched on the off and middle stump line, driven to wide mid-off
seam-up on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler.
slightly slower through the air, on the leg and middle, worked to square-leg
overpitched on the middle and leg, driven to long-on
slow in the air, Dhoni waits for it to arrive and drives a delivery on the off stump to long-on
on the middle and leg stump line, turned straight to square-leg
wide outside off stump. Dhoni watches it sail past him.
And again. Wide outside off. Cann has got the yips.
beaten! short of length, outside off stump, Dhoni shapes to cut but misses.
Another wide. The nerves are showing.
Full-pitched on the stumps, driven to long-on
This is getting bizarre. Another wide and this time way down the leg side.
full in length, Dhoni is surprised that it was on the stumps, leans forward, drives to cover
on the middle and leg,. shovelled to midwicket
quick single is taken after a push towards extra cover
length-delivery on the off stump line, punched to mid-off
full in length, outside off stump, driven to long-on
Wide down the leg side, Ganguly tries to flick, misses and the 'keeper whips the bails off in a flash. But Ganguly's foot is in.
Well outside the off stump, Ganguly lets it go, expecting that it would be called a wide. Looks at the umpire in disbelief!
on the off and middle, driven back to the bowler
charges out and drives to long-off
slower one, dips in front of middle stump line, driven back to the bowler
short, cut to deep point
Back of a length, Ganguly eases back and cuts it square for a couple
Poor bowling again by Cann. Another wide down the leg side. Good take by Dean Minors behind the stumps
back to the bowler, can't get it away there
tapped to the off side and takes off for a quick single. Ganguly playing the anchor here.
shaping into the pads, Dhoni pushes it to long-on and walks a single. He seems to be biding his time  before launching into the big ones
driven down to long-off for a single

And Ganguly relishes the challenge. Flighted ball, on middle and leg, Ganguly waltzes down the track and creams it for a four through long-on. In his pomp, he used to dismiss offspinners imperiously. Great shot
tries to sweep but can't make contact

way down the leg side as Ganguly comes down the track again. Ganguly misses and it's a fine take by the wicketkeeper. He can't get back in time and rams his feet into the stumps. Those who've played gully cricket would have heard of the 'current' stumping. Minors tried that here
defended to the off side and takes off

Got 'em. Borden sees Ganguly charge down the track and fires it in slightly short. Ganguly can't make contact after going for a wild swish, misses the ball completely and this time MInors completes an easy stumping. SOlid innings from Ganguly comes to an end but he misses out on his hundred yet again. He hasn't made a hundred in a long time now but he had no choice but to go for his strokes
off the mark straight away with a tuck to leg side
Good length ball, Yuvraj drives it to the off side for a single
Steered past short third man for a single.
Caressed inside out through extra cover for a fine four. Full length ball and Dhoni uses his bottom hand well to pick up a boundary
Ball cut back, Dhoni pushes to extra cover for a single
Yuvraj drives a full ball to long-off for a single
floated on the leg stump line, deflected to behind square-leg
another quick single to backward square-leg. And they will get an additional run due to an overthrow.
just putside off stump, left alone
on the middle and leg, turned straight to short fine leg
loopy delivery, on the off stump line, Dhoni comes down, tries his unique bottom-handed twirl, gets a outside edge past point
on the middle stump line, Dhoni retains the strike with a drive to long on
on the middle stump line, Dhoni leans forward, opens the bat-face, guides it past point
on the off stump line, Yuvraj drives to long-off
The singles keep coming .This one has been sent down to long-on
full-pitched, straight, on the stumps line, driven to long-on for a single
Wah! innovation at its best! SLower one on the off and middle, Dhoni waits and punches it, bottom-hand powering that stroke, past the bowler and to the straight boundary.
retains the strike with a push to the off side
That one flies over the cowcorner! He charged down the track and swings a length-delivery over wide midwicket. Super strike!

Wow! what a spectacular catch! by Tucker. Dhoni had heaved away, down the ground , Tucker ran across from long-off and was still short of the falling ball when he dived and incredibly held on to the catch. Super effort  and the big wicket of Dhoni falls. He was accelerating the run rate and Bermuda have struck back.
on the middle and leg stump line, Yuvraj leans forward, turns it to square-leg
beaten! In the channel outside off stump, Yuvraj drives but doesn't connect.
comes down the track, to the pitch of the delivery and drives to long-on
spins in from outside off, worked to backward square-leg.
full and straight, on the middle and leg line, Yuvraj stays where he is, wrists it past square-leg for a single
tossed up, outside off stump, driven to left of Leverock at cover who makes a neat diving stop.
full-pitched on the middle and leg stump, Yuvraj drives it elegantly, down to long-on
Now Tendulkar milks a single to long-off.
full in length, outside off and Yuvraj spanks it down the ground, straight to long-off. Good over so far. only singles have come.
leading edge but safe. Full in length, on the off stump line, Tendulkar was looking to punch it to long-off, get a edge and it goes past the point
comes down the track, Leverock cleverly drags back the length and Yuvraj adjusts by pushing at it. Very well bowled.
purrfect arm-ball and Yuvraj is beaten trying to late cut
floated on the off and middle stump line, drilled to the right of long-on
tossed-up, just outside off stump, Yuvraj waits and blasts it down the ground, to long-off.
another arm-ball, sliding in towards the middle stump, Tendulkar is looking for a single, can't place it anywhere though, hit straight to midwicket
flighted delivery, just outside off and Tendulkar goes for a aerial drive, inside-out over cover. Lands in no-man's land.

Appeal for stumping!    the back foot appeared as if it was on the crease. In the channel outside off stump and Yuvraj is beaten while trying to drive. Minors, the wicketkeeper, whips the bails off and a huge shout for a stumping results. It is refered upstairs and not out is the verdict.  Hmm that's strange. It appeared as if it was on the line and the line belongs to the umpire. Did he drag it back, I am not so sure.
on the middle and leg stump line, swung behind square
full in length, outside off, driven to left of long-off for another couple of runs.
short and outside off, cut past point to the sweeper cover
almost decieved Yuvraj with a slower one. Yuvraj goes through with his drive and ends up chipping it over the bowler's head.
flighted delivery, around off stump, driven, with the turn, down to long-on
very clever. Slow through the air, makes Tendulkar wait and gives him no room nor pace to work with. Pushed back down the track.
on the middle and off stump line and Tendulkar sweeps on length.
Slog-sweep for a towering six! He came down the track and went down on his knee and swung it over long -leg.
Blasted away! And again. This one clears the man at deep midwicket. Again he goes down the track, and down on his knee and whacks it away.
Violence! He charges down the track, reaches the pitch of the delivery and hits it cleanly, straight down the ground.
backs away to the leg side, cuts a length-delivery on the middle stump to deep point
waist-high full toss, on the hips, Yuvraj is surprised by it and laps it around to deep square-leg
Now Tendulkar imposes himself. Floater on the off stump line and he went inside-out. Over cover. Skilful strike.
Cute. He moves across, paddle-sweeps it to right of short-fine leg.
around off stump line, Yuvraj wants to dab it to third man, misses and is beaten.
poor delivery. Slips down the leg side and all Yuvraj needed to do was to get a tickle. He does and will get a boundary.
Full ball on middle and Tendulkar paddles it cutely to fine leg for a couple. Fine leg up and Tendulkar takes advantage
Flatter and on off, patted away to the off side for a single
Quick ball on leg, swept away crisply but can't get the meat of the bat onto it. Has to settle for a single
Tendulkar down the track but Leverock reads it well by pitching it in short. He can't get a run off it
Reverse sweep by Tendulkar. Leverock lets out a smile as the batsmen pick up a single
BLISTERING! Full and on middle and off, Yuvraj takes one step and, with a smooth swing, launches it over midwicket for a huge hit. Good end to the over for India
Full ball and Tendulkar pushes down the ground for a single. The plan seems to be Yuvraj taking most strike
Full and outside off. Yuvraj on his knees and drives square for a single
CRACK! Tendulkar lines it up, gives himself a bit of room and swings over long-off for a maximum. Long-off tries to get around but it's just over him.
HUGE! Ripped way over long-off this time. Gets the elevation and the distance as the ball soars over long-off for a huge six. Tendulkar in the mood now
Full toss and Tendulkar flicks it away for two. Smart thinking that time. Sweeper cuts it off
Slower delivery from Tucker and Tendulkar blocks it back to the bowler. Big over for India that time. 16 off it
Flat from Leverock, Yuvraj comes down the ground and tries to sweep but sraight to the fielder at short midwicket
BOSH! Pumels it over midwicket, fielder at midwicket - David Hemp -  pulls off a stunning one handed catch but unfortunately his feet were over the boundary rope
Full toss, driven back to the leg side for a quick single
Reverse-sweep. Another improvised shot there. Doesn't middle it but gets enough on it to get three
Faster one and Yuvraj pushes to long-on for a single. 13 off that over
Yuvraj goes for the drive but inside edges onto the keeper.
TONK! Slow dolly medium-pace outside off and Yuvraj creams it through midwicket for a four. This is the highest team total in the current World Cup so far
What a straight drive that was. He bludgeoned it straight and the ball clattered into the non-striker's stump. That could have easily been a four
Handsome! Slog sweep way behind square for a massive six. Yuvraj going bananas here
Another huge one. Yuvraj going hammer and tongs. This time he launches it over long-off for another huge six. India have beaten their previous record for the highest total in World Cups
Take that! Short ball, Yuvraj pulls it away past the short fine-leg for another boundary. 20 from that over. Bermuda bleeding runs now
CLATTER! Tendulkar makes room, down the ground and smoothly swings his bat, taking the ball way, way over wide long-off for yet another six
Flat and full on off, Tendulkar taps it to the off side and scampers a single
OMG That's murder. Yuvraj takes a short shimmy down the ground and unleashes one almighty wallop way way way over long-off (almost on the third tier) for a maximum maximum

Holed out that time. Tries to loft one over long-off for a six but gets under it and manages just an elevation. Malachi Jones gets around it and takes a comfortable catch. Zinger of an innings from Yuvraj. He managed seven sixes, just one behind Ponting's record for most sixes in a World Cup innings (8)
Reverse paddle from Tendulkar, races past short fine and that's another boundary
Goes for the reverse again. Can't time it and manages only a single after tapping it to cover
SHOT! What a way to reach 400. Tendulkar sweeps the medium-pacer way over short fine leg for a big one
Tapped away to the leg side for a single. HRG: India is the fourth country to post 400 in a one-dayers
Floating on middle and leg, tries to drive, inside edge to backward square leg
Sweeps again but superb stop at the leg-side fence and keeps the batsmen to two
Back of a length and Tendulkar pushes to the off side for a single
WHAT A WAY TO FINISH! Dravid down the ground to a floated ball and blasts it over long-on for a big one. It's dropped by a security superviser in the stands.

inn2.comm: starts off with a delivery in the channel outside off stump, left alone.
rushes through the channel outside off stump, left alone
well outside off stump, left alone. Overcast conditions. The ball will move around.
full in length, lands just outside off and moves away sharply, left alone. He is yet to get his radar right.
around the off stump line, moving away, Pitcher lunges forward, guides to backward point where Yuvraj makes the stop.

Gotcha! Zaheer removes Pitcher. Brought this one in after taking the previous delvieries away. Landed on a length, around off, bent back in a touch and Pitcher had a stab at it. Gets a inside-edge but that proves fatal. The ball rolls back to the stumps and he is a goner.
Way down the off side, Dhoni dives to make the stop
full and just outside off stump, driven to mid-off where Dravid has statitioned himself. Shines the delivery, hands over to Agarkar
beaten. Appreciable movement out there. Landed on a length around off and middle and shaped away. Outerbridge is squared-up, has a poke and the ball rushes past the outside edge
In the zone outside off, left alone
back of length, on the off stump line, Outerbridge shapes to pull, get a bottom edge to the on side.
gets a single with a push to extra cover
rushes through the channel, kissing past the outside edge.
swinging delivery, shaping away and Outerbridge is sucked into a loose drive and is beaten
on a length, around off stump, Outerbridge pushes at it, gets a outer edge, down to Munaf Patel at wide third man
Nicely clipped away! drifting on to the leg and middle stump line, whipped past square-leg
outside off, tempting Borden into a loose drive and the outside-edge takes it down to third man
lands on a length, around off stump, jags back in and raps him on the thigh pad
dabbed down to third man for a single and the rain arrives. Not so heavy but enough to interrupt play.
short of length, around off stump, punched on the up, to mid-off
fishing outside off. beaten. Veers away after landing outside off and Outerbridge has a poke.
back of length, well outside off, run down to third man
and again. Borden lets it go through to Dhoni. Agarkar is yet to get his radar right. He is touch short in length and a tad wide outside off stump
gets it right and almost gets the outside edge.
slipping down the leg side, gets a tickle to fine-leg
homes in on the off stump, Borden gets right behind the line and defends.
jaffa! bounce and movement. Landed on a length, around off and kicked up. Borden stabs at and almost nicks  it behind.
jags back in from outside off stump, Bordern is surprised by the inward movement, takes his eyes off, just waves his bat in front of him, and it thuds into the thigh pad
And again. Again hit too high on the pad.
beaten! Fuller length, lands outside off and comes in. Bordern drives but outside the line and the ball squeezes through the bat and pad gap and kisses past the off stump.
outside edge to third man. Outerbridge pushes at a length-delivery and edges it past gully
on the leg stump line, Bordern seems to have problems with the deliveries that cut back in and again is rapped on the thigh pad
lands on the middle, straightens, Bordern pushes it back down the track. Looked pretty solid this time. Got right behind the line.
He is good through the off side. Leans forward to punch a back-of-length delivery through extra cover. Dravid gives the chase.
full in length, around off stump line, gets a inside-edge to the pad
fullish, outside off stump and slashed away to Dravid at mid-off
full in length, outside off stump, driven to mid-off
bang! Short in length and sits up outside off and Outerbridge pulls it away through widish mid-on

Crash! Outerbridge is cleaned up! Super delivery. Landed full in length, just outside off stump and cut back in. Outerbridge leant forward, jabbed at it but the ball evaded the defensive blade, threaded the bat and pad gap and crashed into the top of the middle stump. Zaheer has taken out the openers.
Ouch! banged in short and it rears up to crash into the forearm as Hemp tries to fend it away.
again a touch short in length, Borden dabs it away to the on side
hits the deck short of length, around off stump, bounces at the batsman who pushes it away to the right of short-leg
on the off stump line, pushed out to point.
Whack! overpitched outside off and creamed through cover
responds with a bouncer, ducked under
on the leg and middle, jabbed to widish mid-on
through the channel outside off, left alone
full and on the leg and middle stump line, attempts to flick it and it runs off the pad to behind square-leg
pushes it down the leg side and Dhoni dives to make a good stop.
Lands on a length, outside off stump, cuts back in a touch, Bordern pushes at it and gets a inside-edge on to the pad
beaten. Climbes from the length, outside off and Hemp has a waft at it.
leg cutter that shaped away nicely but it started off from outside off and went further away. Left alone.
again beaten. back of length, outside off stump, another near-fatal poke.
cuts back in from just outside off stump, stabbed away to left of Uthappa at short-leg who makes a smart stop.
Munaf starts off with the length-delivery down the  leg and middle stump line, flicked past square-leg
super delivery. Landed on a length, around the off stump and shaped away. Hemp is beaten all hands up
full and straight, on the leg and middle, whipped past Ganguly at square-leg.
back of length, on the leg stump line, dabbed back down the track
drifting on to the pads, runs off the pads towards backward square-leg for a leg bye
Clipped away. Again on the middle and leg, clipped off the pads, past Ganguly at square-leg
shout for lbw but it was going down leg.
jaffa. Too good to produce an edge. Landed on a length, just outside off stump and moves away appreciably. Another lame poke but no danger of nicking it as he was nowhere close to it
slides it in, on to the pads and it runs down to short fine leg  for a leg bye
full in length, just outside off stump, pushes at it, gets a outside edge, down to third man
Full-pitched, just outside off stump and driven through cover
slipping down the leg side. Wide called.
around the off stump line, pushed to cover
short of length, moves into the zone outside off, guided to Yuvraj Singh at point
length-delivery, in the channel, pushed to Dravid at mid-off
fuller, just outside off, inviting a drive and Bordern obliges. The bat-face shuts as it comes down and the ball rolls to the on side
on the off stump line, defended towards Dravid at mid-off
shout for lbw but umpire signals that there was a inside-edge. Full in length, curving in, Bordern drives, loosely and must have got a thin inside-edge.
full in length, on the off stump line, pushed towards mid-on and Hemp sets off. Bordern hesitated slightly but makes it time. Dravid's throw misses the target.
again appreciable movement for Zaheer. Starts off from outside off and shapes away. Another waft inside the line.
fuller and closer to the off stump, pushed through the cover region
lands on a length, just outside off, cuts back in and raps him on the pad. But going down leg side.
length-delivery on the middle stump, turned right of  Uthappa at short-leg and he makes a smart stop
Edged over the slips. Full in length, on the middle stump line, Hemp looks to work it to the on side but instead gets a leading edge and it flies over slips
in the channel outside off, pushed to cover
another swish, another miss. It is all happening outside that off stump.
fab effort from Yuvraj at point to take a catch but it falls short of him. Slashed away and he dives forward but it bounces in front.

given out lbw. full in length, bounces and Bordern shapes to play it across the line and is hit in front of off stump. The height was the concern and it would have gone  over but Aleem Dar doesn't concur. Raises the fatal finger and Bermuda are three down.
he is greeted by a bouncer and Romaine ducks under it in a hurry
Wow! What a fab shot! Six over cover! Agarkar hurled one across full in length and outside off stump, Hemp just leant forward and walloped it inside-out over cover.
full in length, driven to mid-off, Hemp wants a run, the captain is not impressed with the call and you got to listen to the captain. Hemp retreats
on the off stump line, defended on the back foot
fullish, hint of inswing, turned into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
lands on a length, outside off, slides in a touch, Romaine gets behind the line, pushes it to the off side
low full-toss, on the middle stump, turned straight to mid-on
good-length delivery, on the middle stump line, slides away a touch, pushed to point
short in length, a tad outside off and slashed over gully, down to third man for a single
hits the deck short of length, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
shout for lbw but turned down. The point of impact was outside off. Full-pitched delivery that cut back in and Romaine is caught at his crease. A lame push forward and was rapped on the pad.
bouncer as Patel pushes Romaine back. He was caught by surprise and somehow sways away from it
leans forward to defend a length-delivery
starts off with a no ball. on the off stump line, guided to backward point.
slider on the middle stump line, lapped around the corner. That is a risky shot , had he missed it, he would have been caught plumb in front
lands on the off stump line, turns away a touch, pushed to cover
topspinner, with bit of bounce and Romaine is beaten trying to cut.
Kumble gets a lbw. Doesn't surprise me. Romaine got his front pad way across and then had to play around it and by that time the skidder had gone on to rap him in front of middle and leg.
slides down leg side and the ball deflects off the pads to race away to the fine-leg fence
Slider from Kumble, outside off, padded away. Appeal goes out for lbw but he was struck way outside off that time
Back of a length and straight, tapped away to the on side. They look for the single but decide against it after seeing the fielders home in like vultures
Too good for Hemp that time. Back of a length and seaming away prodigiously after pitching. Hemp pokes a tentative poke but is beaten comprehensively
Another cracker. Not as much movement off the pitch this time but Hemp has no answer to that one either
drifting on the pads, Hemp tries to turn it away but ends up padded it to the on side for a single
Another probing delivery. Outside off and in the corridor. Tucker lets it go
Oh you beauty. Too good for the batsman that time. Fullish and outside off, seaming in after pitching and beating Tucker comprehensively. Ball sneaks between bat and pad but misses the stumps
Full ball on middle and leg, dug out and flicked away behind square for a single
Quicker ball outside off, tucker can only get his pad in front. Huge appeal from the bowler but can't be given since he's struck just outside the line

Castled! Tucker walks down the track and tries to slog Kumble over midwicket. It's a googly and there's a huge, gaping space between bat and pad. Ball sneaks through and crashes into the stumps. Kumble gets his second as Bermuda move closer to the precipice
Short ball, tries for the flipper. Pulled to the midwicket region for a single
Blocked back to the off side
Flighted and slightly slower, pitched on leg stump and Hemp flicks it away straight to the mid-on fielder
Full length ball, driven back to the bowler
Back of a length, tapped away to the off side by Minors. Good teasing spell by Munaf
short one, banged in. Munaf bends his back and pitched it on off. The ball seams away prodigiously after pitching. Minors can only flinch and watch as the ball nestles into the wicketkeeper
Quick full ball and Minors doesn't offer a shot, being rapped on the lunging pads. Big appeal but it's missing off
Straighter one, pitched on middle and moving into the batsman. Cramps him for room and Minors can't get it away
Flicked to square leg
Slides away from outside off stump, Hemp plays inside the line and is beaten
bit more air, outside off stump, driven to cover
flighted up on the middle and leg side, swung to long leg
full and on the off and middle stump line, is struck on the pad, in front of off, as he pushes forward in defense.
googly on the middle and leg, swept in front of square.
on the middle stump , slow through the air, defended away
full, on the middle stump line, squirted away to Ganguly at square-leg
Slashed over Sehwag at third slip. Full and well outside off and he has flash.
on the off and middle, moves away a touch, pushed to cover
full and on the stumps, defended away to the on side
kicks from a length, on the middle and leg stump line, he takes out the bottom-hand out of the bat-handle, jabs it away behind square-leg
full in length, on the off stump line, pushed to Yuvraj Singh at point
on the leg stump line, swept fine. Four more. Kumble is not too pleased! But Minors is not complaining. He is going to keep sweeping.
tossed up, full in length, driven to cover
nice loopy delivery on the off and middle, Minors shaped to drive but resists at the last minute, just pushes it out
nice and compact. Leans forward and defends
slightly risky this time. Dragged that front foot a touch across - Kumble is homing in there for a lbw- and and dabs it away to the off side
is hit on the pad as he pushes across but outside the off stump
Bosh!  Short of length delivery outside off and Hemp leaned on to his square-drive and punched it on the up, past point. Very skilful stroke.
leans forward and defends a fullish delivery on the off stump line
Thump! Super drive! Half-volley outside off and he smoked it through cover.
beaten! lovely delivery that nipped away from a lunging Hemp.
And again. Deja-vu. Agony for Munaf, relief for Hemp.
Slashed to third man. Full in length, in the temptation zone and Hemp obliges with a drive. Gets a outside edge and through gully.
on the off stump line, driven to mid-off for a quick single
floats it outside off stump, pushed to cover
shout for lbw but it is sliding outside off. Another sweep shot attempted by Minors, unsucessful this time.
drives to cover
pushed through, across Minors who leans forward and pushes it out to the cover region
slightly slower through the air, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot.
Banged in short and Hemp ducks under it .
another bouncer, wide down the leg side
Way outside the off stump. Agarkar is still get his radar right.
short of length, on the off stump, pushes at it, gets a inside-edge to the on side
Another bouncer, swayed away. Dhoni throws the ball to Sehwag at slip. he applies saliva to the ball, shines it and hurls it across to mid-off.
fullish, in the zone outside off and Hemp has a swing and a miss.
on the pads, runs off the thigh pad to the right of Dhoni who moves across to make the stop.
Another sweep by Minors. Another boundary.
leans forward and jabs at a full-length delivery, it beats the bat, thuds into the forearm and runs away towards slip
puts bat to the ball this time and pushes it out to the off side
thrusts his front foot across, and defends
just outside off, defended on the front foot
Minors goes down town. Stretches out and lofts a flighted delivery over mid-off.
slides on to the pads, clipped past square-leg. Hemp moves to 46. He has played a real solid knock today.
another short-pitched stuff, Hemp calmly sways away.
Thrash! just a single though. It was a pretty good strike. Full in length, outside off and he carved it to deep point
short of length, on the middle peg, defended down the track.
Wah! Wah! What a strike! Full and swinging on to the legs, Minors picked it up nonchalantly over long leg. Ala Jayasuriya.
bangs it short, rises chest-high, on the off stump line, Minors adjusts and fends it away towards backward point.
On the off stump line, slightly short in length, cut past point

from round the wickets, comes a floater on the middle stump line. Minors is rapped on the pad as he pushes forward in defense. Dhoni goes up in appeal. Looks like it would have taken out leg. Anyways...
on the middle and leg stump line, played to the on side
on the off stump line, driven to cover
slower in the air, just outside off, left alone
Minors falls after a stiff resistance. Agarkar gets a wicket.  Minors wanted to work a length-delivery on the middle stump line to the on side, gets a leading edge and presents a dolly at mid-off.
Around the off stump line, driven to cover

Double strike by Agarkar. Banged in short and he shapes to pull but instead pops it towards cover. Uthappa runs in, dives forward to take it very close to the ground. Did it touch the ground? The batsman thought so and stood his ground. The umpires confer and gave it out. Was the fingers underneath the ball or did it touch the grass? I think it touched the ground, Ian Bishop, on air, thinks the fingers were underneath. He has played Test match cricket, I have played gully cricket.
Outside the off stump, left alone
slider outside off stump, left alone
full and straight, on the off stump line, pushed back down the track
Hemp brings up his fifty. It is the first fifty by a Bermuda player in World Cup cricket.  It was short in length and he pulled it imperiously through midwicket. Well played Sir.
leans forward and smothers the spin.
In the zone outside off stump, left alone.
Just when people are slamming him, Agarkar gets another victim. Triple strike! Pitches on the off stump line and hits the off stump. Hurdle's bat comes inside the line and he is cleaned up.
leans forward and defends. Huge cheers go around the arena. A real popular character.
And again.
Leverock is off the mark with a four. Glanced away to fine leg. He shuffled across and turned a delivery on the hips, down to fine-leg
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
on the middle stump line, Hemp leans forward and defends. bit of inside-edge on to the pad.
looks pretty solid as he drives one to cover
drags back the length, Hemp turns it behind square-leg and they run two. The crowd erupt as Leverock rushed back for the second run.
tossed up on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
pushes that one through quicker, sliding down leg side and Leverock is rapped on the pad as he pushes forward.
pushed to the off side

dug in short, pulled away, skies it towards Ganguly at deep square-leg but Ganguly doesn't run in fast enough and applied the brakes a touch early. May be he lost it in the back ground. Agarkar didn't look too impressed with the effort.
low full toss, pushed to mid-off
outside off, short in length, guided to point
full-toss on the middle stump line, flicked past square-leg for couple of runs.
down the leg side, attempted sweep shot makes no contact , neither does Dhoni.
edged through the vacant slip region. There is a short-leg but no slip in place. Hemp lunged at it and gets away
full in length, on the off and middle, pushed to point
drifting on to the legs, flicked away to Munaf Patel at long leg
shout for lbw as another slider rushes through the defense. Struck in front of the middle stump line, the height was the concern. Going over.
hurls that across full, it crashes into the boot but it was going down leg side
leans forward and defends
on the middle stump line, sliding towards leg, glanced away behind square
in the channel outside off, left alone
similar delivery, Leverock is squared-up a touch, has a waft at it and is beaten
in the channel outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
again takes it away. again Leverock is beaten.
fuller and outside off stump, Leverock tries to launch himself into a drive but doesn't reach it
turns outside off and Hemp lets it go. Some sharp turn there. He is bowling from round the wicket
tossed up on the middle stump line, swept away
spins in from outside off, dabbed away to midwicket
floated on the middle stump line, jabbed away past square-leg
arm-ball, comes in from outside off stump, Hemp stabs at it, gets a inside-edge, on to the pads and it rolls towards square-leg
on the leg and middle stump line, Hemp is caught in a tangle, trying to work across the line and is rapped on the pad. But i was going down leg side
sails down the leg side. Wide called.
full in length, driven to sweeper cover
on the leg and middle stump line, straightens a touch, and it runs off the pad
bouncer and Hemp, quite calmly, ducks under. He is in complete control out there.
on the off and middle stump line, pushed to cover
short of length, outside offf stump, slashed away to third man.
Down the leg side. Hemp tries to sweep, misses but it run off the pad, down to fine-leg boundary
floats in from outside off, Hemp is struck on the pad as he leans forward. Maybe it would have spun past the off stump. sehwag appeals. turned down.
driven to long-off
flatter and on the legs, worked to fine-leg
leans forward and offers a perfect forward defense
turns in from outside off, Leverock goes back and offers the full face of the bat in defense
down the leg side, flicked away
from round the wickets comes a fullish delivery that teases the outside edge!
on the middle stump line, Leverock gets right behind the line and turns it to midwicket. Zaheer continues to bowl round the stump at the RHB
no difference though. Leverock again gets behind the line and defends. Indian bowling looking a tad flat here.
short of length, kicks up above waist-high, Leverock again moves behind the line and defends
fullish, on the middle stump line, defended away.
floated outside off, Hemp tries to sweep but is struck on the pad. Point of impact outside off.
leans forward to defend
Wallop! Hemp moves to 73. Tossed on the off stump line, Hemp leans forward and drives inside-out over cover.
drifts in from outside off, dabbed away to square-leg.
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot.
turns down the leg side, padded away
legbreak on the off stump line, driven to long-off
long hop, shovelled away to midwicket. One slip in place.

Tendulkar removes the rock. Leverock. A flighted legbreak, short in length, outside off stump that turns ever so slowly and Leverock couldn't resist the urge to cut, and nicks it behind. Dhoni makes no mistake. Leverock as he walked out of the arena, acknowledged the crowd. Bermuda are nine down. Hemp might be left stranded.
tossed up a slow googly outside off, bit too wide to interest the batsman

suddenly switches to seam-up. Quite a big inswing! how many variations this little  big man has. Swings in from outside off and raps the batsman on the pad. Appeal goes up but it was struck outside off stump
another seam-up stuff. Defended on the front foot
spins past Hemp's bat and into Dhoni's gloves
pushed through extra cover and he will take the run. Jones will be on strike. he took a wicket of his first delivery.
turns in from outside off, padded away
and again.
full and on the off stump, driven to the bowler
fuller, on the middle stump line, hit across the line, down to Ganguly at deep midwicket.
And he finishes it off with a lbw. Typical Kumble. Full in length, on the off and middle and it slides in to catch Jones in front of the middle stump.
